basics.label: Software Engineer/Architect
basics.name: Vikas Chouhan
basics.summary: I have ~12+ years of experience in professional software development across various domains such as low level embedded software, application level infrastructure tools development and recently data analysis and applied machine learning. I graduated with a B.E. degree in Electrical Engineering in 2009 and currently working at Nurithm Labs Pvt Ltd as an engineering cofounder for last 2+ years.

work.summary: As an engineering cofounder, I am responsible for driving the engineering side of the business.That includes product development, research, testing and deployment as well as mentoring new hires such as interns etc.
highlights: Research and development activities for developing and training a suitable neural network architecture for detecting 20 common skin disease conditions.
Experimenting with various preprocessing and postprocessing schemes for arriving at an optimized training/inference pipeline.
Reading research papers and converting them to prototype implementations (openmax, SVM based, DOC, Log softmax, Spherical softmax) for out of distribution (open set) recognition.
Contributing (technical writing, results generation and analysis etc) to various journals which we worked in collaboration with our partner doctors.
Scaling the NN model from 20 classes to 40 classes and eventually 55 classes at the end of 2019.

work.summary: I was part of Partner Enamblement team, responsible for handling technical queries and issues from ARM Licensee partners in process of getting their cores ARM compliant.
highlights: Working as a bridge between ARM partners and internal development teams, facing customer issues and helping to resolve them.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: I was in Digital Networking Group's post silicon validation team taking part ownership of multicore CPUS & cache subsystem across various SOCs.
highlights: Microprocessor core & L2/L1 cache validation for various DN SOCs (P4080, P50xx, P20x0, BSC913x, C290, T4240, T1040 etc).
Test development for targeting cache coherency & memory consistency issues on various multi-core SOCs.
Test development for validating shared resources (execution units/L1 d-cache etc) inside an Symmetric Multi Threaded microprocessor.
Multi-core bare-metal validation test framework development for ARMv8 based SOCs, enabling us to write & run complicated powerful assembly tests at a much higher abstraction level (in Python).

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: I was part of Digital Networking Group's Silicon Bringup Team working primarily as tools and infrastructure developer.
highlights: Development and maintenance of various infrastructure tools, doing enhancements, resolving internal issues etc.
Porting primary validation tool from SunOS to Linux.
Simics integration for dynamic expects generation.
